search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Strava (strava.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Strava is: [https://www.strava.com/pricing](https://www.strava.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Strava | Pricing
===============

[Strava](https://www.strava.com/)

[Menu](https://www.strava.com/pricing#container-nav)

*   [Mobile](https://www.strava.com/mobile)
*   [Features](https://www.strava.com/features)
*   [Subscription](https://www.strava.com/subscribe?cta=premium&element=nav&origin=logged_out_global_nav)
*   [Maps](https://www.strava.com/maps)
*   [Stories](https://stories.strava.com/?utm_source=website-header)
*   [Give a Gift](https://www.strava.com/gift)
*   [Sign Up](https://www.strava.com/register?cta=sign-up&element=global-header&plan=free&source=website_pricing)
    
    [Log In](https://www.strava.com/login?cta=log-in&element=global-header&source=website_pricing)
    

Updating Subscription Prices
============================

_Updated: July 10, 2024_

Strava is moving to consistent subscription pricing by country – this means that all subscribers in a country will pay the same monthly or annual price. Subscribers will get an email from Strava 30 days prior to their renewal date with the updated price they will pay and instructions to update their subscription.

#### United States

*   Subscribers pay $11.99/month or $79.99/year plus applicable taxes.
*   Subscribers on a Family Plan pay $139.99/year plus applicable taxes.

[Learn More](https://www.strava.com/subscribe?origin=pricing) about the Strava subscription and see [What's New](https://www.strava.com/whats-new) or [Manage your account](https://www.strava.com/account)

Need help updating your country? [Contact us.](https://support.strava.com/requests/new)

_Note: Prices are displayed in local currency_
